snippet: Three players from New York City, and one from Jupiter, Fla., were the most successful at the event in Smithtown, N.Y., last week.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played at the Long Island Fall Regional in Smithtown, NY.
lead_paragraph: Three players from New York City, and one from Jupiter, Fla., were the most successful at the event in Smithtown, N.Y., last week.

headline.seo: A Bridge Deal From the Long Island Fall Regional
headline.main: A Deal From the Long Island Fall Regional
